languages.text: "До сих пор не приходилось. Я не провожу время в размышлениях о подобном — это, в лучшем случае, бесполезное занятие".
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
languages.original_text: "До сих пор не приходилось. Я не провожу время в размышлениях о подобном — это, в лучшем случае, бесполезное занятие".

traits.locale_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
"I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

languages.text: 「今まで、そのような必要はありませんでした。そもそも、そういったことに思いを巡らせる時間など持ちません。そんなのは無意味な道楽にすぎません」
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: 「今まで、そのような必要はありませんでした。そもそも、そういったことに思いを巡らせる時間など持ちません。そんなのは無意味な道楽にすぎません」

languages.text: "Das war bisher nicht erforderlich. Ich denke über so etwas nicht nach – das wäre bestenfalls fruchtlose Zeitverschwendung."
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: "Das war bisher nicht erforderlich. Ich denke über so etwas nicht nach – das wäre bestenfalls fruchtlose Zeitverschwendung."

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais eu à le faire. Je ne perds pas mon temps à envisager de telles possibilités. Il ne s'agit, au mieux, que d'une distraction stérile. »
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais eu à le faire. Je ne perds pas mon temps à envisager de telles possibilités. Il ne s'agit, au mieux, que d'une distraction stérile. »

languages.text: «De momento no me ha hecho falta. No suelo perder el tiempo pensando en esas cosas; es, en el mejor de los casos, un ejercicio de futilidad».
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: «De momento no me ha hecho falta. No suelo perder el tiempo pensando en esas cosas; es, en el mejor de los casos, un ejercicio de futilidad».

languages.text: “到目前为止，我还没遇到过这样的处境。我不会浪费时间考虑这种事情，这充其量只能算是毫无意义的消遣。”
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: “到目前为止，我还没遇到过这样的处境。我不会浪费时间考虑这种事情，这充其量只能算是毫无意义的消遣。”

languages.text: "Şimdiye kadar böyle bir zorunlulukla karşılaşmadım. Böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yorup boşa vakit harcamıyorum. Faydasız bir eğlenceden ibaret."
languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdiye kadar böyle bir zorunlulukla karşılaşmadım. Böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yorup boşa vakit harcamıyorum. Faydasız bir eğlenceden ibaret."

languages.original_text: "I haven't had to so far. I do not spend time contemplating such things — it is a fruitless pastime at best."
